wipe_lever.description: Wipe the lever to clean it.

rotate_lever.description: Rotate the lever in either direction.

clean_lever.description: Wipe the lever to clean it.

flip_lever.description: Flip the lever back and forth.

wipe_knob.description: Wipe the knob to clean it.

rotate_knob.description: Rotate the knob in either direction.

twist_knob.description: Twist the knob either to the left or right.

clean_knob_again.description: Do another wipe of the knob to ensure it's dust-free.

spin_wheel_around.description: Spin the wheel all the way around.

slide_wheel.description: Slide the wheel along its track.

wipe_wheel.description: Wipe the wheel to clean it.

rotate_wheel.description: Rotate the wheel in either direction.

spin_wheel.description: Spin the wheel around in either direction.

wipe_chair_leg_down.description: Wipe the chair leg top to down to clean it.

wipe_leg.description: Wipe the chair leg to clean it.

wipe_leg_again.description: Perform another wipe of the chair leg to make sure it's fully clean.

slide_seat_back.description: Slide the seat back for more space.

slide_seat_forward.description: Slide the seat forward for less space.

wipe_seat.description: Wipe the seat to clean it.

slide_seat.description: Slide the seat in and out.

rotate_seat.description: If possible, rotate the seat to adjust its position.

wipe_seat_again.description: Perform another cleanse of the seat to ensure it's completely clean.

slide_caster_out.description: Slide the caster out to extend it.

slide_caster_in.description: Slide the caster in to retract it.

slide_caster.description: Slide the caster in and out.

wipe_caster.description: Wipe the caster to clean it.

rotate_caster.description: Rotate the caster in either direction.

spin_caster.description: Spin the caster around in either direction.

adjust_chair_prep.description: Rotate the knobs and levers, slide the seat and caster, and spin the wheel to prepare for adjusting the chair.

clean_chair_new.description: Wipe all parts of the chair to clean it from dust and dirt.

adjust_whole_chair.description: Adjust the entire chair to desired comfort.

clean_every_chair_part_again.description: Perform a secondary clean of all parts of the chair to ensure its cleanliness.
